title: can someone please explain the current state of the tribunal in oce
body:
Hi all, long time listener first time caller. 

I've been looking around and am trying to find the current state of the tribunal. 

I've just my third promo game  in a row, in all three it was 4v5 with an afk on my team. I used to enjoy this game, but with this kinda carry on i'm thinking it might be time for something that has a bit better support.

Does anything happen to players if they afk and are reported?

Thanks!

replies.body:
As far as I know, there is no tribunal. However, the new insta ban system is pretty good for toxic players (I'd know, I was banned).

As for AFK'ers? Not too sure. It seems to be a bit more lenient on them. I've heard that people who frequently leave get placed on lower priority queues etc.
